::Grimmler::

Grimmler exits the CR chambers, recieving K-9's transmission. He sighs, 
walking the distance to the exit and looking at the new bot.

"My name's Grimmler," he says, introducing himself, "I'm a pilot here."

He looks at the new bot's ship, and then looks back at the bot, "Who are you?"
